text: Sagarmatha ma taunah k garne manis haru kati bhanda thiye? 1000 manis haru har saal Sagarmatha chadhna jancha bhancha, jasma kun desh ka chadhain garne manis sabai bhanda dherai huncha? American ra European manis haru sabai bhanda dherai chadhne garne. Chadhai ko lagi kun kun season sabai bhanda upayukta huncha? Basanta ra sharad season sabai bhanda upayukta huncha.
summary: Har saal karib 1000 manis Sagarmatha chadhna jaancha, jasma American ra European manis pramukh huncha.

text: Ramayan ko kahani ma Lanka ko raja Ravana ko kati daantha thiyo? Ravana ko 10 daantha thiyo ra uha bijyanta ko pratik hunuhunthyo. Ram le sita udhaar garna Lanka ma kati sena sath lagna bhayo? 1 lakh bhanda badhi banar sena le Ram lai saath diye. Lanka ko sundar nagarik dhani hunthyo bhanne kahile lekhiyeko cha? Lanka ma sona ko mahal ko bibaran cha jasma Ravana ko shakti ra dhani chha bhanne dekhauna sakcha.
summary: Ramayan ma Ravana ko 10 daantha thiyo, Ram le 1 lakh banar sena sath Lanka ma sita udhaar garnu bho.

text: Nepal ma kati ota sanskritik sampada UNESCO ko World Heritage ma suchikrit chhan? Nepal ma 10 ota sampada suchikrit chhan, jasma Kathmandu upatyaka ma 7 ota sampada parcha. Pashupatinath mandir kata chha ra kun kal ko ho? Kathmandu ma ra Lichhavi kal ko ho. Changu Narayan ko mandir kati barsa purano ho? Tyo mandir karib 1500 barsa purano ho bhancha.
summary: Nepal ma 10 UNESCO sampada suchikrit chhan, jasma Kathmandu upatyaka ma 7 parcha.

text: Mansarovar taal kaha chha ra usko uchai kati ho? Mansarovar taal Tibet ma parcha ra usko uchai 4590 meter chha. Tyo taal Hindu ra Bauddha dharma ma kin mahatwapurna ho? Tyo taal pavitra maninchha ra Kailash Parbat ko najik chha, jasle pavitrata ko pratik bancha.
summary: Mansarovar taal Tibet ma 4590 meter uchai ma chha ra Hindu-Bauddha dharma ma pavitra maninchha.

text: Mount Everest ma chadhne sabai bhanda pahila ko Nepali ko naam ke ho? Tenzing Norgay ko naam Nepali mountaineer ma sabai bhanda pahila Everest chadhne ma aauchha. Unle 1953 ma Edmund Hillary sanga chadhai garnu bhayo. Kun mahina ma tyo chadhai sampanna bhayo? May mahina ma chadhai sampanna bhayo.
summary: Tenzing Norgay le 1953 ma Edmund Hillary sanga May mahina ma Mount Everest chadhnu bho.

text: Ek din Ram jungle tira gako thiyo. Tyaha usle ek sundar jharna dekhecha. Kati uchcha jharna thiyo bhanera Ram le sochcha. Karib 100 meter ko uchcha jharna thiyo re. Ram le tyaha ghanta bhanda badi samaya parkhi rahiyo ra sundar drishya herera ghar farkiyo.
summary: Ram le jungle ma ek 100 meter uchcha jharna dekhera ghanta jati samaya tyahi bitayo.

text: Prithvi Narayan Shah le kati ota rajya ekikrit gareko thiyo? Tesbela Nepal ma 54 ota rajya thiyo ani sabai ekikrit garna Prithvi Narayan Shah le thulo mehanat gareko thiyo. Uha le Kathmandu upatyaka ma sabse pahila Bhaktapur ma akraman gareko thiyo.
summary: Prithvi Narayan Shah le Nepal ka 54 ota rajya ekikrit garera Kathmandu upatyaka ma pahila Bhaktapur ma akraman gare.

text: Buddha le gyan kahile ra kata prapti gare? Gautam Buddha le 35 barsa ko umar ma Bodh Gaya ma gyan prapti gare. Uha ko dharma aba kati desh ma chha? Karib 100 desh ma Bauddha dharma ka anuyayi haru chhan bhancha.
summary: Gautam Buddha le 35 barsa ko umar ma Bodh Gaya ma gyan prapti gare ra unko dharma 100 desh ma chha.

text: Sagarmatha chadhna kati jana haru har saal jaanchan? Karib 1000 jana haru har saal chadhna jaanchan re. Kun season sabse ramro huncha? Basanta ra sharad season sabai bhanda ramro ho bhancha.
summary: Sagarmatha chadhna 1000 jana haru har saal jaanchan ra basanta-sharad sabai bhanda ramro season ho.

text: Ramayan ma Ravana ko kati taauko thiyo? Ravana ko 10 ota taauko thiyo bhancha. Lanka ko sundarta kasto thiyo? Lanka ma sona ko mahal thiyo ani tyo nagarik le khub maya garne thiyo. Ram le Lanka ma sita udhaar garna kati sena lagna bhayo? Ram le 1 lakh bhanda badi banar sena liyera Lanka gaye.
summary: Ramayan ma Ravana ko 10 taauko thiyo ra sita udhaar garna Ram le 1 lakh banar sena Lanka lagna gaye.

text: Nepal ma UNESCO World Heritage ma kati thau suchikrit chhan? Nepal ma 10 thau suchikrit chhan jasma Kathmandu upatyaka ma 7 ota parcha. Pashupatinath mandir kata cha ra kun kal ko ho? Tyo Kathmandu ma chha ra Lichhavi kal ko ho.
summary: Nepal ma 10 UNESCO World Heritage sites chhan, jasma Kathmandu upatyaka ma 7 ota parcha.

text: Mansarovar taal kata chha? Tyo taal Tibet ma parcha ra usko uchai 4590 meter chha. Hindu-Bauddha dharma ma kina mahatwapurna ho? Kina bhane tyo taal pavitra maninchha ra Kailash Parbat ko najik chha.
summary: Mansarovar taal Tibet ma 4590 meter uchai ma chha ra pavitra maninchha.

text: Mount Everest pahila chadhne Nepali ko naam ke ho? Tenzing Norgay ko naam ho. Uha le Edmund Hillary sanga 1953 ma May mahina ma chadhnu bhayo. Kun mahina ma chadhai sakiyo? Tyo chadhai May mahina ma sakiyo.
summary: Tenzing Norgay le Edmund Hillary sanga 1953 ma May mahina ma Mount Everest chadhnu bhayo.

text: Ek din Sita ghar ma basera pakhera banai rahi thiyo. Bari ko kera pakaera tyo khana jharkinu thiyo. Tyahi bela Sita ko chhori le tyo kera khayera mitho bhanera prashansa garin. Tyo kera khayera sabai khushi bhae ra din ramailo bitayo.
summary: Sita le bari ko kera pakai din ramailo bitai.

text: Pokhara ma ek jana machuwa le Fewa taal ma thulo machha pakadeko thiyo. Machha itro thulo thiyo ki usle ek ghanta lagai samaya lagaera taaniyo. Tyas machha le usko parivar ko khana ko chinta ek hapta samma hataidiyo.
summary: Pokhara ko ek machuwa le Fewa taal ma thulo machha pakadcha ra parivar ko ek hapta ko khana ko chinta hataucha.

text: Lumbini ma ek mandir ko puja lagataar pandhra din samma chaliyo. Tyas mandir ma thulo mela lagyo ra thulo sankhya ma manis haru puja garna aaye. Mandir ko priest le dharmik mahima ko barema dherai kura sunnu bhayo.
summary: Lumbini ko mandir ma pandhra din samma puja chaliyo ra thulo sankhya ma manis aayen.

text: Chitwan ko jungle ma ek din bagh le hatti ko pachadi lagyo. Hatti ko awaj le najik ko gaun ma bhayanka halchaal machayo. Tarika milaera bagh lai jungle ko bhitra jhagada nagari paltaiyeko thiyo.
summary: Chitwan ko jungle ma bagh le hatti ko pachadi lagera afno margh ma farkiyo.

text: Basantapur ma ek din thulo jatra lagyo jaha sajha bela samma nach ra git ko ramailo thiyo. Newar samuday ka manis le ekdamai sundar parkar le sajawat gareka thiyo. Tyas jatra le dherai manis lai basantapur tira taneko thiyo.
summary: Basantapur ko jatra ma nach, git ra sajawat ko ramailo thiyo.

text: Karnali ko najik ek ghumti ma ek jana gaunle le sundar sano ghar banayo. Usko ghar tira chhora chhori sath dine ghumti haru din bhari ramailo banthyo. Tyo ghar bata huri ayo bhane pani sajilo ko lagi sekai ko byabastha garera basthyo.
summary: Karnali ko ghumti ma ek gaunle le sundar ghar banai ramailo jeewan bitayo.

text: Annapurna trek ma ek din pahad chadhiraheko tourist group le sundar himal herera thakko laag huncha bhanera basti ko najik rest liyeko thiyo. Gaunle haru le mitho khana ra ramailo sanjh ko bebasta gare. Tyo din sabai group member le himal ko sundarta ko prashansa gare.

summary: Janakpur ko ram mandir ma sundar deepawali ko bebasta thiyo ra manis haru khushi bhae.

text: Koshi nadi ko cheu ek din dherai manche haru baluwama aaraam gardai thiyo. Nadi ko shital hawa le sabai lai taaja banayo. Tyesko cheu ma kehi kisan le nadi ko paani le afno khet sinchai garirahe thiyo. Tyaha ko drishya le sabai ko man khushi banayo.

text: Sugauli Sandhi 1816 ma British ra Nepal ko bich ma bhayo, jaha Nepal le apno territory ko dherai part harayo. Sandhi le Nepal lai Himalayan buffer state ma limit garyo. text: Tribhuvan rajale 1950 ma Rana shashan birudhha ko kranti lai agadi badhauna bhumika khelna thalyo. text: Nepal ma 1934 ko bhukampa le Kathmandu, Bhaktapur ra Patan ma thulo nuksan garyo. Historic durbar square haru ko thulo bhag dhwasta bhayo. text: Malla kal ma Kathmandu valley ko teen shaharma unka alag-alag rajya thiyo, jaha art, architecture ra culture ma competition thiyo. summary: Malla kal ma Kathmandu, Bhaktapur ra Patan ko art ra culture ko competition le valley lai vibrant banayo.

text: Chandra Shumsher Rana le Nepal ma Sati Pratha abolish garna thulo kadam liye. Sati Pratha ko according, ek widow le afno husband ko chita ma jalnu parthyo, jun ek cruel practice maninthyo. 1920 ko decade ma Sati ko end garda Rana shashan ko legacy ma ek thulo change ayo. Aja pani yo ek progressive step ko rup ma maninchha.
summary: Chandra Shumsher le Sati Pratha ko abolishment garera Rana shashan ma ek reform le ayo.

text: Dhulikhel ancient Newari town ho, jaha centuries dekhi trade route ko center thiyo. Tyaha bata Tibet jane caravan haru le goods exchange garthyo. text: Nepal ma Kot Parba ek historic event ho, jaba 1846 ma Jung Bahadur Rana le Kot massacre ko dwara Rana regime ko shuruwaat garyo.
